rows.label: qev080404_MSG0001
rows.name:
I bought the weapons, Mother, but...
Where is everyone else? Where are the others?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0002
rows.name:
Being the boss of an empty cave isn't exactly the career
opportunity I had in mind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0003
rows.name: Oh, quit your whinging! Who do you think I am?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0004
rows.name:
I am Fortun, keeper of the galaxy's wisdom!
My daughters will crowd here any day now,
sick with worry for their dear mother![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0005
rows.name:
Then we will use the arms you have assembled to raze
New LA to the ground! Eeee hee hee hee![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0006
rows.name:
Erio and [ST:playername ] will pay dearly for
humiliating—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0007
rows.name: This... No! How are you here?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev080404_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Fortun that you tracked her here.

rows.label: qev080404_JNK0020
rows.name: Shout

rows.label: qev080404_SEL0021
rows.name: Angrily vow to thwart Fortun's scheme.

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0008
rows.name:
How very conscientious of you. But ultimately useless.
I simply decided to take a little vacation here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0009
rows.name:
There is no cause for you to trouble yourself on my
account. Why don't you hurry back to your city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0010
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0011
rows.name: Now, Lyvia! Kill! You are more than a match for [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0012
rows.name:
Eep! Y-you can bluster all you like.
I'm not s-scared of you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0013
rows.name: Take care of this, Lyvia! Kill [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] where [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] stands![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0014
rows.name:
What?! N-no way!
I can't handle [ST:playername ]...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0015
rows.name:
Bah! Defeat this nuisance for me, and I will allow you
to rule all of New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0016
rows.name:
Now go! ...Or I shall take back my promise to instate
you as queen of the Definians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0017
rows.name: Whaaat? ...Oh, fine! I guess I don't have a choice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0018
rows.name: S-stop! Time out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0019
rows.name:
Look, all I did was gather some weapons because
Mother said I could be leader of a Definian army.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0020
rows.name:
I never signed on to take over New LA,
and I certainly have no interest in harming you guys![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0021
rows.name:
LYVIA! You dare to call yourself my daughter?
You will fight for me so long as you draw breath![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0022
rows.name:
Now, kill [ST:playername ] this instant.
Then we shall storm New LA together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0023
rows.name:
No way! ...And quit kidding yourself, Mother—none of
the other sisters are coming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0024
rows.name:
The Definians are done being your slaves.
We want to work as proper employees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0025
rows.name:
...Can you forgive me, [ST:playername ]?
I promise to cut all ties with Mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_JNK0030
rows.name: Forgive

rows.label: qev080404_SEL0031
rows.name: Show mercy to Lyvia.

rows.label: qev080404_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev080404_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Lyvia that she must pay for her crimes.

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0026
rows.name: Aw, you are SO nice! Thank you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'd rather work for someone like you than for Mother
any day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0028
rows.name:
I'll get out of the way here. As for Mother,
you have my permission to do your worst.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0029
rows.name:
Well then I have no choice... I didn't want to unleash
my ultimate technique, but you've forced my hand...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0030
rows.name:
RUN AWAAAAAAAAAAY! ...And I promise never to
do it again so please forgive meeee![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0031
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0032
rows.name:
Really, it is most kind of you to have come all this way
just to pick me up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0033
rows.name:
Such a dear friend you are. Now let us hurry back to
our home sweet home of New Los Angeles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_JNK0050
rows.name: Destroy

rows.label: qev080404_SEL0051
rows.name: Eliminate Fortun.

rows.label: qev080404_JNK0060
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev080404_SEL0061
rows.name: Do as Fortun asks and return her to New LA.

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0034
rows.name:
Whoa what...n-n-NO! Wait! Wait just a minute!
This was all a joke, don't you see? Eee hee? A joke?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0035
rows.name:
Look, I did this for you! Aren't you BORED now that
Luxaar is gone? Mmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0036
rows.name:
I just wanted to give you a little bit of excitement!
You know—as a special surprise gift?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0037
rows.name: Wait! N-no, don't—GYAAAAAAARRGH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0038
rows.name:
I share your sentiment, but try to hold it in.
Monster or not, she IS my mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0039
rows.name:
Besides, if this mess has proven anything, it's that she
holds no sway over the Definians now. No harm in
letting her live when she can't do anything again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0040
rows.name:
I am pleased to see that your minuscule intellect can
grasp the wisdom of a peaceful resolution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0041
rows.name:
Now, off you go! Whisk me back to that cesspool of a
city you call h—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0042
rows.name:
Looks like no amount of attitude adjustment is enough
to save this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0043
rows.name:
Really, Mother, this is simply pathetic.
No wonder the other sisters abandoned you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0044
rows.name:
Y-you impudent whelp! Just whom do think you are
speaking to?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0045
rows.name:
A loudmouthed hunk of metal who is tragically also
my mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0046
rows.name:
...I owe you yet again, [ST:playername ].
I'll take responsibility for disciplining Mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080404_MSG0047
rows.name:
We'll see you back in the city. 
Drop by in a bit, would you?[ST:wait ]
